casebody.data:
Certiorari Granted — Affirmed in Part and Reversed in Part.

(See No. 7M337, ante, p. 922.)

Miscellaneous Orders

No. 74-730. Roemer et al. v. Board of Public Works of Maryland et al.

Appeal from D. C. Md. [Probable jurisdiction noted, 420 U. S. 922.] Motion of appellees for additional time for oral argument granted and 15 additional minutes allotted for that purpose. Appellants allotted 15 additional minutes for oral argument.
